name: REFLECT (ardiente, Pranay Ramteke, Deepanjali Sarna)
description:
A monologue adventure between the protagonist and his nemesis.

Make sure to notice every difference! The new elements are your cue.

Reflect is a visual novel game made for BYOG 2021 jam.  The theme used in the game is Two views,  Minimal interaction, and  Reset.  

(Apologies for the longer load time)
